QuestData.Title: More Lazy Peons
QuestData.Description: We have a rare opportunity to strike at the heart of the Warsong. But, we need your wisdom and leadership.$B$BThe most important decision will be your choice between building a corral or a tankworks. This choice will setup our approach to the fight against the Warsong.$B$BThazz'ril will head up our building efforts. Will you give him a hand?$B$BIt looks like he's having trouble motivating his peons to work.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: This is the enemy of Victory! This stands in the way of the Horde's success! Properly motivate him!
QuestData.RewardText: I knew it was a mistake to bring these guys with me from the Valley of Trials.
